article_title: Ultra-Orthodox students must be drafted, Israel court rules
sentence: The  ruling  of  the  countryâ€™s  highest  court  referred  to  the  fact  that  large  numbers  of  soldiers  had  recently  been  killed  while  fighting  for  their  country,  saying:  "Discrimination  regarding  the  most  precious  thing  of  all  -  life  itself  -  is  of  the  worst  kind.
